keyMoments.title: The Unluckies Deliver Eternal Pose
keyMoments.description: Baroque Works' messenger duo, the Unluckies (Mr. 13 and Miss Friday), arrive at Little Garden to deliver an Eternal Pose to Arabasta to Mr. 3.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the organization's communication and delivery system for critical missions.

keyMoments.title: Leader Deceived by Sanji
keyMoments.description: Mr. 0 (Crocodile) receives a false report from someone he believes is Mr. 3, not knowing he's actually speaking to Sanji of the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: First time Baroque Works' leader has been successfully deceived, showing a crack in the organization's intelligence.

keyMoments.title: Crocodile Orders Mr. 3's Elimination
keyMoments.description: Suspicious of the report, Crocodile orders Mr. 2 Bon Clay to intercept and eliminate Mr. 3 before he reaches Arabasta.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the ruthless nature of Baroque Works where failure or suspicion leads to execution by fellow agents.

jollyRoger.description: A stylized skull with a crown

keyMoments.title: Obtain Eternal Pose to Arabasta
keyMoments.description: Through Sanji's clever deception, the Straw Hats obtain an Eternal Pose that will guide them directly to Arabasta.
keyMoments.significance: Allows the crew to bypass normal navigation and sail straight to their destination, accelerating their journey.

keyMoments.title: Departure from Little Garden
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates leave Little Garden on the Going Merry, setting course for Arabasta with Vivi and Karoo.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of the Little Garden Arc and the crew's progression toward the major Arabasta confrontation.

ships.description: The crew's first ship, a caravel gifted by Kaya

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
